title: 自定义村民交换命令方块
author: 遗憾
txt_content:
比如一个村民，交换成书，成书里面有内容，一本成书交换另一本成书（里面都有内容）要怎么交换？？
求大神，举个例子之类的.

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:1,Career:1,CareerLevel:9999999,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:written_book,Count:1,Damage:0,tag:{title:"书名",author:作者,pages:[P1,P2,P3]}},sell:{id:minecraft:written_book,Count:1,Damage:0,tag:{title:"书名",author:作者,pages:[P1,P2,P3]}}}]}}
复制代码
教程
村民交易 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-209951-1-1.html
书本 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-213256-1-1.html
书本Json http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-285895-1-1.html

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
例如：
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:264,Count:1},sell:{id:387,Count:1,tag:{title:"Test",author:Notch,pages:[P1,P2,P3]}}}]}}

召唤一个村民，用钻石换一本书，书的名字叫Test，作者是Notch
第一页内容是P1
第二页是P2
第三页是P3
